item.title: Is this command correct?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:7, topic:252622”][quote author=supra s link=topic=333690.msg2599468#msg2599468 date=1230150210]
if(command.startsWith(“runes”) && playerRights >= 3) {

just replace this
[/quote]

I thought you would know better than that.

startsWith, is not what you want to use with this. Use:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 3) {

instead, reason being because there is no parameters needed for that command.[/quote]

lol maybe his server use that ?? duno but i dont wana confuse that kid end its solved anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Is this command correct?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:5, topic:252622”]if(command.startsWith(“runes”) && playerRights >= 3) {

just replace this[/quote]

I thought you would know better than that.

startsWith, is not what you want to use with this. Use:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 3) {

instead, reason being because there is no parameters needed for that command.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this command correct?
item.dc:creator: @thepker13 thepker13
item.description:
@thepker13 wrote:

	if(command.startsWith("runes")&& playerRights >= 3)) {               
		addItem(554,999999999);
		addItem(555,999999999);
		addItem(556,999999999);
		addItem(557,999999999);
		addItem(558,999999999);
		addItem(559,999999999);
		additem(560,999999999);
		additem(561,999999999);
		additem(562,999999999);
		additem(563,999999999);
		additem(564,999999999);
		additem(565,999999999);
		additem(566,999999999);
	sendMessage("You have recieved alot! of runes");
}
